abstract: Exploring the benefits and drawbacks of reading news articles and reading alternative story forms that combine text and images.
snippet: Exploring the benefits and drawbacks of reading news articles and reading alternative story forms that combine text and images.
lead_paragraph: Open any day's print edition of The New York Times, and you will see not only various types of news and opinion articles, but also creative ways of presenting content, like infographics. And the Web version enables multimedia and interactive features.

headline.main: Article vs. 'Charticle': Comparing Coverage of a Qaeda Operative's Killing
